text: And I will put enmity between thee and the woman and between thy seed and her seed, he shall 3. 15 Gr. keep. Other readings of the passage are πλήξει and πλήξεις and τειρήσει and τειρήσεις. See Parkhurst in שף.watch against thy head, and thou shalt 3. 15 Gr. keep. Other readings of the passage are πλήξει and πλήξεις and τειρήσει and τειρήσεις. See Parkhurst in שף.watch against his heel.
